13:51 <Pbas> Hello, it seem I manage to use javamelody to monitoring xwiki but I didn't manage to secure access page to /monitoring :-/ On my tomcat, I follow instructions from https://github.com/javamelody/javamelody/wiki/UserGuide#16-security (I want BASIC authentication with username and password)  
13:52 <Pbas> but my browser didn't displayed login/password question when I'm going on /monitoring page  
13:54 <Pbas> I follow this instruction: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Monitoring#HJavaMelody and inserted <init-param> section  
13:54 <vmassol> hi Pbas, don't know how it's done for xwiki.org (but we have protection for sure, see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/monitoring )  
13:55 <Pbas> my xwiki is on root  
13:55 <Pbas> of webserver  
13:55 <Pbas> maybe it is the cause of my problem  
14:17 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> has joined #xwiki  
14:17 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> hello everyone  
14:17 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> i just need a little tip, i can't find the import button on xwiki 8.3 to try to import a word document plz  
14:34 <Pbas> Hello, sorry I didn't found office importer anymore too...  
14:36 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_6: hi  
14:36 <vmassol> you need to click on the "+" button  
14:36 <vmassol> but first you need to have configured an office server :)  
14:36 <vmassol> see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Office+Importer+Application  
14:45 <xwikiorg\_guest\_6> Thanks :)
